name: Mesut Özil
strengths: Calm midfield presence who plays a pass with the eye of a needle
Mazy dribbling style that allows him to glide through the opposition
Patient ball retention gives the impression that he has more time than anyone else on the field
Can play out wide or in the middle to devastating effect
Timing of the pass that splits the defence in the final third
Can juggle a piece of chewing gum
